parameters.name: Fwd
parameters.description: True makes the end of the extrusion a translation of the reference surface in the forward direction, false makes the end of the extrusion a translation of the reference surface in the reverse direction

title: IExtrudeFeatureData2.GetTranslateSurface
description: Gets the translate surface setting for this extrude feature.

parameters.name: Fwd
parameters.description: True makes the end of the extrusion a translation of the reference surface in the forward direction, false makes the end of the extrusion a translation of the reference surface in the reverse direction

returns: True if the translate surface setting is enabled, false if it is disabled
